entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Background set to Transparent doesn't have the same behavior as BackgroundColor = Transparent #22769
  • The Comma Seperator is disabled on the Samsung Numeric keyboard. #22761
  • FontImageSource renders slow on Android in ImageButton and Image #22757
    9.0-preview5
  • TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage on android with android:TabbedPage.ToolbarPlacement="Bottom" does not fit all screen #22755
  • iOS App crashes when populating CollectionView #22754
  • (iOS) - Memory Leak in CollectionView with GroupItemTemplate on iOS in MAUI #22752
  • Using radiobuttons in a group, pressing one button works fine, but pressing the seconf button does not reset the first hence "blocks" the radio buttons all together. #22750
    .NET 8 SR6
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Hosting.EffectsFactory' has been registered #22748
    .NET 8 SR7

Closed

  • ListView duplicate first item #22742
  • Multi-Window in Windows with all options #6210
    Backlog
  • Give developers more (full) control over control colors #7542
    Backlog
  • [Android] ContentViewHandler is incompatible #7884
    Backlog
  • Need Material Design implemented as part of Visual quite like Xamarin.Forms #9689
    Backlog
  • If the user hasn't specified a VSM then look at ways to only apply color changes to the "normal" state of a control #8819
    Under Consideration
  • MAUI needs a good (selfhosted) serverless partner. #11435
    Backlog
  • Build MAUI library targeting .NET6 should have a Platforms folder #10689
    Under Consideration
  • XmlReader performance #10103
  • Removing a background on iOS does not remove the background #12117
    Backlog
  • Reinstate xml-docs build artifact for easier API docs publication #22736
  • iOS Binding Library Errors: Undefined symbols for Architecture arm64 (also x86_64) #22770
  • Error when running the project as windows machine #22498
  • Taskbar badge notifications for Windows apps #13994
    Backlog
  • Make IBorderElement properties settable #13349
    Backlog
  • VisualState "Pressed" not supported on a "Border" control #13108
    Backlog
  • Exception occurs when modifying an ObservableCollection that has a binding to a BindableLayout on a thread from the ThreadPool #17302
  • MediaElement Record Audio #17144
    Backlog
  • all maui app crash on a multi-user android system #17501
  • mono_aot_corlib_init_method_gshared_mrgctx #18425
  • [Android] David's Control Gallery Crashes on Rotation of initial screen #17549
    Backlog
  • xamarin_find_protocol_wrapper_type #18426
  • MAUI iOS: Command line to build maui ios app for iPhoneSimulator without CodeSigning key on Mac machine #18836
  • [iOS] Building the MAUI base app raise warnings with RuntimeIdentifier=ios-arm64 #19012
  • Cannot build iOS widget apps with extensions (ditto exited with code 1) #19104
    Backlog
  • Add support for macOS native instead of Mac Catalyst #20225
    Backlog
  • Android Notch Calculation similar to iOS SafeArea (DisplayCutout API) #20906
    Under Consideration
  • Horizontal CollectionView cut content (iOS) #22756
  • ShellRenderer on iOS doesn't change color #22751
  • Microsoft.Maui.ApplicationModel.NotImplementedInReferenceAssemblyException #22519
  • Finally I was able to create the IPA file with this command and upload the file with altool without any errors. #22694
  • Preserving State and UI when App Returns from Background #22747
  • iOS flyoutmenu with flyout content as collectionview doesn't respect flyout width #22567
  • Infinite ANR loop in MAUI UI with Android 13 #21130

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove .NET 7 from bug template #22759
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Housekeeping] Fix Issue22433Test #22753
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Merged

  • Correct path to gather API docs artifacts in CI #22737
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Add .NET 9 preview 4 to bug template #22758
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #22713
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [Windows] Set `CanDrag` and `AllowDrop` only if needed #22640
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, t/perf
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
    area-architecture, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Handlers] Make sure to update Content on handlers when the ControlTemplate changes #15656
    area-layout, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area-xaml, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, legacy-area-perf, area-infrastructure, stale, memory-leak 💦, t/perf
  • Core remapping alternate take #18635
    area-architecture, stale
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
    area-testing
  • Make `PointerOver` to have higher priority than `Focused` state #19812
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • use raw string literals #19961
    legacy-area-perf, area-architecture, community ✨, t/perf
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area-drawing, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    area-drawing, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [iOS] CharacterEncoding should be used instead of NSStringEncoding. #20398
    do-not-merge, area-controls-label, megapipeline/main
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • Re-Enable CA1416 #20477
    area-infrastructure
  • Add an API to allow registering TypeConverters for third-party types #21476
    area-xaml
  • [WinUI] Perf when creating non-trivial grids (and other visual controls) (take 2) #22108
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, legacy-area-perf, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix code-style and minor perf improvements in `GesturePlatformManager.Windows.cs` #22632
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22660
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix BindingAdapterPosition Exception #22676
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Improve performance in accessibility extensions #22698
    community ✨, area-core-platform, t/perf
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • Make sure ImageButton always has a background #22717
    area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping - fix #22741
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Update the WebAuth code to support Mac Catalyst #22739
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-essentials
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
